comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of medication patches
- y: number of anti-biotic creams

Definitions:
- x: number of medication patches to be made
- y: number of anti-biotic creams to be made

Extracted Constraints:
- 3x + 5y \leq 400 (total minutes constraint)
- 5x + 6y \leq 530 (total materials constraint)
- y \geq 2x (twice as many anti-biotic creams as medication patches)
- x + y \leq 100 (total batches constraint)
- x \geq 0 (non-negativity constraint for medication patches)
- y \geq 0 (non-negativity constraint for anti-biotic creams)

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize 3x + 2y (maximize the number of people that can be treated)
